name: Abbacus Technologies
description:
Abbacus Technologies is a leading Web and Mobile Application development company. We are an ISO 9001:2008 certified company with 17+ years of expertise and experience in the IT industry. We currently provide services in more than 100 countries and have created a strong base of more than 2000 clients. With a worldwide reach, we support our clients by attaining the highest standards possible in the industry.
Our unique solutions take the guesswork out of your project by uncovering actionable insights that will fuel the growth of our client's business. Our approach and methodology make us different and more competitive than our competition. We are committed to helping our clients achieve sustainable growth and creating value for their stakeholders. Our job is to transform their idea into reality, be it on a Website or Mobile Platform. Our deep industry knowledge, combined with the widest range of capabilities, enables us to help our clients reach the next level.
